posts.post_content:
Hey guys,  I think I have a pretty good deal for an 05 collector here.  A bunch of these are crease free (about 10 I think)  including the Chase.  No trash, nice cards.  27 total for 600 firm.  The schmidt has a cool miscut back and no creases.  A few tougher backs and variations included..  Paypal f/f.



Lot is sold.
Can you post or message me a list of the names?  They are difficult to make out from the pictures.
